variants.name: zombie
variants.description: Emerging from the darkest crypts, the Graveborn Zombie is a terrifying sight with flesh marred by the decay of ages.

variants.name: zombie_green
variants.description: The Noxgreen Zombie's skin glows with a sickly green hue, a result of the toxic fumes that animated its undead form.

variants.name: light
variants.description: This rare zombie, illuminated by an internal ghostly light, wanders ancient graveyards, eternally seeking to reclaim its lost soul.

variants.name: amber
variants.description: Preserved in mystic amber, this zombie radiates a warm glow, belying the cold death that has touched its soul.

variants.name: olive
variants.description: Infested with the flora of the forest where it was buried, the Verdant Rot Zombie brings a piece of the woodland with it wherever it roams.

variants.name: taupe
variants.description: Caked in the dust of the barren lands, this zombie blends into the desert, making it a nearly invisible predator.

variants.name: bronze
variants.description: This zombie's skin has been fused with molten bronze, giving it a shimmering, indestructible exterior.

variants.name: brown
variants.description: Risen from the swampy earth, the Mudborn Zombie is covered in thick mud that oozes from its pores, exuding a stench of decay.

variants.name: black
variants.description: The Shadowmire Zombie thrives in the absence of light; its pitch-black appearance makes it a phantom in the night.

variants.name: lavender
variants.description: Imbued with the essence of spectral flowers, this lavender-hued zombie exudes a mesmerizing aroma that masks its true danger.

variants.name: blue
variants.description: The Frostbite Zombie's icy blue skin is a remnant of its time trapped beneath a frozen lake, its touch now as cold as the waters that entombed it.

variants.name: green
variants.description: The unnatural green pallor of this zombie's flesh is the result of the vile experiments that gave it unlife, making it a horror to behold.

variants.name: pale_green
variants.description: This ghostly pale green zombie glows faintly in the dark, its eerie light a beacon of doom for the living.

variants.name: bright_green
variants.description: The bright green skin of this zombie sizzles with acidic venom, a dangerous remnant of the chemicals that resurrected it.

variants.name: dark_green
variants.description: Hailing from the darkest forests, this dark green zombie blends into the shadows, stalking its prey with deadly precision.
